Description: Omphalos sherd of East Greek pottery phiale mesomphalos; black (fired brownish) glaze; interior: on top and on side of flat omphalos, added red and added white bands; underside: red bands.
Curator's comments: Only a few examples of phialai mesomphaloi with black slip on both the interior and the exterior are known. See Lemos pl. 114-5, no. 814 (from Kavala).
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GO.469)
